title: The Ol' Amnesty Box
itunes:title: The Ol' Amnesty Box
description:
This week: startling airport drop boxes, Alex's adventures in high-tech VCRs, the eternal greatness of Lumines (but maybe not the Switch), games like Dune: Spice Wars, Gibbon: Beyond the Trees, and Warhammer 40k except XCOM, the PS Plus subscription lineup, Jim Ryan's bizarre missteps on reproductive rights, Silent Hill rumors, the Starfield delay, and more!

Advertise on The Nextlander Podcast at Gumball.fm, or support us on Patreon!

CHAPTERS

00:00:00 NOTE: Some timecodes may be inaccurate in versions other than the ad-free Patreon version due to dynamic ad insertions. Please use caution if skipping around to avoid spoilers. Thanks for listening.

00:00:10 Intro

00:03:00 Traveling Brad

00:05:29 Show rundown

00:09:18 I don't SMOKE WEEEEEEDD

00:12:59 Alex's new purchase

00:14:00 When Mom and Dad Break Up

00:19:38 Warhammer 40,000: Chaos Gate - Daemonhunters [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on May 05, 2022

00:30:14 First Break

00:30:46 Dune: Spice Wars [PC (Microsoft Windows)] on Apr 26, 2022

00:42:11 How's that Switch holding up?

00:45:57 Lumines is still very good

00:48:05 Gibbon: Beyond the Trees [Switch, Mac, PC (Microsoft Windows)]

00:54:44 Citizen Sleeper [Xbox Series X|S, PC (Microsoft Windows), Xbox One, Nintendo Switch] on May 05, 2022

01:02:08 Second Break

01:02:35 Starfield is officially delayed

01:16:53 Games coming to PlayStation Plus' tiers

01:33:18 Jim Ryan needs to think about his words

01:45:00 There will be more Need for Speed

01:49:42 There will be more Silent Hill as well!

01:58:09 Wrapping up and thanks

01:59:02 Mysterious Benefactor Tier Shoutouts

02:00:31 We're almost at 1 year!

02:02:40 Nextlander content updates

02:03:58 See ya!

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
